summary: This pack replace several vanilla eyes, more specifically it includes new eyes for humans and elves: 9 Eyes for Humans, 4 Eyes for Dunmeri, 3 Eyes for Altmeri, 3 Eyes for Bosmeri. Optional Alternate Replacer Dark Elves Eyes (Bright Blue, Bright Green and Bright Red)
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=150][color=yellow]Magistrate Eyes[/color][/size]
by [i][color=red]Magistrate[/color][/i]

[b][size=5][color=red]1000+[/color] Downloads; [color=red]500+[/color] Unique[/size][/b]

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Description_zpsd5aebd43.jpg[/img]

Since [url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/3523]Oblivion[/url] I always hated the vanilla dead-looking eye colors so I took as a base the excellent textures from Nevenbridge\'s Natural Eyes and worked on them with GIMP trying to bring vibrant colors and at the same time trying to stay close to the lore. Therefor, I present to you: Magistrate Eyes for Skyrim.  The pack replace several vanilla eyes, more specifically it includes new eyes for humans and elves; also, while the [color=orange]Standard Version[/color] ships with lore-friendly dunmer eyes I got incredibly bored with the good-ole red eyes for all dunmer and I made an [color=cyan]Alternate Version[/color] which includes three bright colors (blue, green and red) for dark elves only.

- 9 Eyes for Humans
- 4 Eyes for Dunmeri
- 3 Eyes for Aldmeri
- 3 Eyes for Bosmeri

- 3 Eyes for Dunmeri [Alternate]

[size=1]*Sorry about Orcs, Kahjit and Argonians but I did only the races that I normally play, if there\'s request though I may work on a new release for the missing races though.[/size]

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_ASR_zps38290402.jpg[/img]

[color=red]If you like my eyes, please post a picture of your character with your \"new\" eyes, and of course don\'t forget to endorse :)[/color]

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_ChangeLog_zpsf1ef8cda.jpg[/img]

1.0 
Initial release.
1.1  
Slightly tuned Dark Elves eyes. Unfortunately lore is quite strict when it comes to Dunmeri, they all got red eyes.
1.2
Repackaged All Standard Eyes.
Added Alternate Dark-Elves Eyes (Blue, Green, Red).

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Installation_zps65c9502d.jpg[/img]

Either extract the content of the zip file in your data folder

- OR - if you want to use just SOME eyes

Open \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\
Pick the eye(s) you want to install and put them in your \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\

[img]http://i1283.photobucket.com/albums/a553/Mafia2050/M_Uninstallation_zps145493ef.jpg[/img]

Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyeblind.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyeblue.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyebrown.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyedarkelf.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyedarkelfdeepred.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyedarkelfdeepred2.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\darkelfunique1.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyegreen.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyegrey.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyehazel.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyehazelbrown.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyehighelf.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyehighelfdarkyellow.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyehighelforange.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyelightgrey.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyedarkblue.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyeiceblue.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyewoodelf.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyewoodelfdeepbrown.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyewoodelfdeepviolet.dds
Delete \\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\Eyes\\eyewoodelflightbrown.dds
